   5: // Common Library: Clock Gating cell with synchronizer
   6: 
   7: module prim_clock_gating_sync (
   8:   input        clk_i,
   9:   input        rst_ni,
  10:   input        test_en_i,
  11:   input        async_en_i,
  12:   output logic en_o,
  13:   output logic clk_o
  14: );
  15: 
  16: 
  17:   prim_flop_2sync #(
  18:     .Width(1)
  19:   ) i_sync (
  20:     .clk_i,
  21:     .rst_ni,
  22:     .d(async_en_i),
  23:     .q(en_o)
  24:   );
  25: 
  26:   prim_clock_gating i_cg (
  27:     .clk_i,
  28:     .en_i(en_o),
  29:     .test_en_i,
  30:     .clk_o
  31:   );
  32: 
  33: 
  34: endmodule
  35:
